title: SolrCloud: (epic) improve "Developer Curb Appeal", cleanup Developer Packaging for new devs
description:
This is master JIRA issue to track cleanup tasks, hopefully for 4.2

The idea is to cleanup low hanging fruit that makes Solr Cloud a bit of a hassle to use.  Main areas:

1: Solr command line args
2: Solr URL tweaks (or redirects)
3: Web UI Cloud related tweaks
4: Documentation
